messages.content: Show TCS employee count, attrition rate, number of employees added, and what are the analyst recommendations and target price for TCS stock

Here's the information you requested:

**TCS Employee Count, Attrition Rate, and Number of Employees Added:**

As of Q1 FY26, TCS has:

* Employee count: 613,069 [3]
* Attrition rate: 13.8% [1][3]
* Number of employees added: 6,071 [1]

As of Q3 FY26, TCS has:

* Employee count: 582,163 [2]
* Attrition rate: 13.5% [4]
* Number of employees decreased: 11,151 [4]

**Analyst Recommendations and Target Price for TCS Stock:**

I was unable to find the list of analyst recommendations and target price for TCS stock, however, here are a few recent articles:

According to a recent article, TCS's profit soared to Rs 12,760 crore during the April-June quarter [3].

To get the most up-to-date information on analyst recommendations and target prices, I recommend checking financial websites such as:

* Trendlyne: https://trendlyne.com/equity/1372/TCS/tata-consultancy-services-ltd/
* NDTV Profit: https://www.ndtvprofit.com/markets
* Data Insights Market: https://www.datainsightsmarket.com/news

Please note that analyst recommendations and target prices can change frequently, and it's always best to check with a financial advisor or conduct your own research before making investment decisions.

References:

[1] Data Insights Market. (n.d.). TCS Q1 FY26 Results: Attrition Down, Growth Up - What it Means. https://www.datainsightsmarket.com/news/article/tcs-q1-fy26-results-attrition-down-growth-up-what-it-means-73834

[2] Trendlyne. (n.d.). TCS Live Share Price, Stock Analysis and Price Estimates. https://trendlyne.com/equity/1372/TCS/tata-consultancy-services-ltd/

[3] Storyboard18. (n.d.). TCS attrition rate holds steady at 13.8% in Q1 FY26, headcount stands at 613,069. https://www.storyboard18.com/how-it-works/tcs-attrition-rate-holds-steady-at-13-8-in-q1-fy26-headcount-stands-at-613069-73845.htm

[4] ScanX Trade. (n.d.). TCS Q3 Attrition Rate Rises to 13.5%, Headcount Falls by Over 11,000 Employees. https://scanx.trade/stock-market-news/earnings/tcs-q3-attrition-rate-rises-to-13-5-headcount-falls-by-over-11-000-employees/29763188
